mapper.select: SELECT h.hw_no, h.hw_course, h.hw_title, h.HW_CONTEXT, h.HW_STARTDATE, h.HW_ENDDATE, h.UPLOAD_NO, s.SERVICE_NO, u.PK_NO, u.UPLOAD_LOCATION, ua.USER_NO, ua.USER_NAME FROM HOMEWORK h JOIN COURSE c ON h.HW_COURSE = c.COURSE_NO JOIN UPLOAD u ON h.UPLOAD_NO = u.UPLOAD_NO JOIN SERVICE s ON u.SERVICE_NO = s.SERVICE_NO JOIN USER_ACCOUNT ua ON c.COURSE_INSTRUCTOR = ua.USER_NO WHERE h.HW_COURSE = 1
